title: research-paper-writer-initial-mvp
close_reason:
Initial MVP of AI Scholar Writer app completed with:

- Next.js project setup with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- Main application layout with paper section wizard
- Brave Search API integration for literature search
- APA citation management system  
- Paper section types and structures
- Responsive academic-style UI

The app allows users to input their research theory and get guided through the paper writing process with section-by-section wizard, literature search, and citation management.
